Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Creates the substance use disorder treatment bill of rights to be posted in a conspicuous place in all treatment facilities
Summary: Creates the substance use disorder treatment bill of rights to be posted in a conspicuous place in all treatment facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง22.03, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to creating a substance use disorder treatment bill of rights
